title: A travel misadventure - the root of the problem

content.description: Directions: You will now listen to a dialogue. After the dialogue. you will be asked several questions about what you have just heard. Select the best answer to each question from among the four choices.

choices.label: La dame et ses amies se sont trompées de gare.
Le contrôleur a changé les billets.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
